title.native: カードファイト!!ヴァンガード レギオンメイト編

description:
Several days after the mortal battle against Link Joker which embroils the whole world, the world has returned to peace.

But Kai Toshiki faces a surprising situation. Sendou Aichi, the hero who saved the world from the invasion of Link Joker, has suddenly disappeared. In addition, everyone's memory about Aichi is lost...Almost all hints have been lost, and Kai starts to search Aichi with "Blaster Blade" and the deck of Royal Paladin, the only existing hint and the proof of their bonds.

Kai is approached by fighters who call themselves "Quatre Knights". The four---Gaillard, Neve, Ratie and Sarah---are fighters with world-class power in vanguard fights. They control mysterious power and urge Kai to give up searching Aichi. What is their purpose...!? And what is their relationship with Aichi...!?

Kai, with the new power "Legion" in his hand, fights to take Aichi back. Now, the war has begun!


(Source: Cardfight!! Vanguard Wikia)

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

node.description: Akira Ito (伊藤 彰, Itō Akira) is a manga artist. Ito drew Yu-Gi-Oh! R while the creator of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, Kazuki Takahashi, came up with the storyline. Ito's drawing style is similar to Takahashi's. Ito later co-created Cardfight!! Vanguard in collaboration with Satoshi Nakamura (technical advisor for Duel Masters) and Bushiroad president Takaaki Kidani, he is also the author of Cardfight!! Vanguard manga and Cardfight!! Vanguard G: THE PROLOGUE, as well as the illustrator/designer of several cards in the Cardfight!! Vanguard game.
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

__[Profile (Imagine)](https://www.imagine-music.co.jp/artist/index/10)__

__Birthplace:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Takayuki Negishi__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer, arranger and music producer affiliated with Imagine Music, better known for his composition work on several anime, such as; the hit magical girl TV series Cardcaptor Sakura, Tokyo Mew Mew and Mnemosyne. He began working in the industry as a synthesizer operator in 1983, before he later became a composer. He also produces music for several  artists like Mariko Nagai and Hiroko Moriguchi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/m_tomisan) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/lmtomi/)

Originating from Studio Live. Currently freelance.
